entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
